summary: "The Adventures of Tintin" is a popular European comic series written by Belgian author Hergé. It follows the adventures of Tintin, a brave young reporter, and his dog Snowy. The series began in 1929 and became very successful, with over 200 million copies sold in many languages. It features exciting stories with different genres, like fantasy, mysteries, and science fiction, filled with humor and clever commentary. The comics are known for their clear and expressive drawings. Even after Hergé's death, the series continues to be loved worldwide.
title: The Adventures of Tintin
